title: 96840D37-ACEE-4F43-AA7B-F1549EBCF9BB
important_topics: Fraud fighting resolutions for the New Year
companies: Social Security Office of the Inspector General
fraud_tips: Add a trusted contact to your account
Understand what is available to you at your organization
Improve fraud knowledge from frontline employees to consumers
Embrace AI for the good to enhance fraud fighting efforts
Advocate for real time fraud monitoring to prevent fraud
Build empathy into your fraud response to encourage reporting
Connect with other fraud fighters to share challenges and insights
tactics: Using stolen credentials to bypass multi factor authentication
Draining accounts before institutions can react
Using AI for deepfakes, synthetic identities and phishing attacks
